Combine all data into a data frame

combine_all_data.Rd

Combine all data into a data frame

Usage

combine_all_data(
  dir = here::here("data-processed"),
  wcgbt,
  nwfsc_hkl,
  pacfin,
  recfin_lengths,
  recfin_ages,
  ca_rec_oto = NULL,
  ca_com_oto = NULL,
  wa_com_oto = NULL,
  ca_rec_carcass_oto = NULL,
  ca_com_pilot_oto = NULL,
  coop_rec = NULL,
  ccfrp = NULL
)

Arguments

dir

Directory location to save the compbiend data frame

add definition

add definition

add definition
